body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Andrew Harris and I represent Stylish Cuts Hair Salon. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Crystal. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My email address is crystal.green@example.com and my phone number is five five five, two three four, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Crystal. Is there any particular reason you are reaching out to us today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I recently visited your salon for a haircut and I was not satisfied with the service I received. Can you please help me with that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Crystal. I will do my best to address your concerns. Could you please provide me with more details about your experience and what went wrong?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. During my visit, the stylist was not attentive to my requests and the final haircut did not turn out as expected.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Crystal. We strive to provide top-notch service and I will make sure to look into this matter further. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your assistance, Andrew. Can you also let me know about the available options for rectifying this situation?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Crystal. We have different options available to ensure your satisfaction, such as a complimentary haircut or a refund. I will personally follow up with you to discuss this further. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Crystal. I aim to resolve this matter promptly. Have a great day and thank you for choosing Stylish Cuts Hair Salon.
